description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and country Planning Act 1990 for variation of conditions 1, 3-16, 19, 23, 27, 29, 31, 32, 37 and 39-46 of planning permission ref: P080281, dated 11 September 2008, to have the effect of varying the requirements of the timing of the submission of details or commencement of works pursuant to these conditions.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The relevant phase of the development shall not be occupied until the proposed works to the internal footways to that development phase have been completed in accordance with detailed plans and specifications to be submitted and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to commencement of such works.

Reason: To ensure the improvement works are completed prior to the occupation of the development and to mitigate the future impacts of the proposed development on the existing road network, in accordance with policies: D3; T7 and T12 of the Islington UDP 2002 and policies: 3C.1 and 3C.2 of the London Plan 2008.
